<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the name of the topmost commanding menu or "" if the menu is closed. For action menu visibility check see [[isActionMenuVisible]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''commandingMenu''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[waitUntil]] {[[commandingMenu]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> "RscStatus"}; [[hint]] "Press 4, I'm bleeding !";</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[commandingMenu]] != "") [[then]] { [[hint]] "Command menu is opened" };</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[showCommandingMenu]], [[isActionMenuVisible]], [[BIS_fnc_addCommMenuItem]], [[BIS_fnc_removeCommMenuItem]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>

<h3 style='display:none'>Notes</h3>
<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on July 15, 2009 - 12:21 (CEST)
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]
<dd class="note">
Possible values are :
*'''""''' - means menu is closed
*'''"RscMainMenu"''' - Main menu, by pressing backspace
**'''"RscMoveHigh"''' - Move menu (1)
**'''"#WATCH"''' - Watch menu (2)
***'''"#WATCH0"''' - Watch menu - next page (2-0)
**'''"RscWatchDir"''' - Engage menu (3)
***'''"RscWatchMoreDir"''' - Engage menu - watch a direction (3-8)
**'''"#GET_IN"''' - Mount menu (4)
**'''"RscStatus"''' - Status menu (5)
***'''"RscCallSupport"''' - Mount menu - call support (5-1)
**'''"#ACTION"''' - Action menu (6)
**'''"RscCombatMode"''' - Combat mode menu (7)
**'''"RscFormations"''' - Formation menu(8)
**'''"RscTeam"''' - Team menu (9)
***'''"RscSelectTeam"''' - Team menu - select team (0-5)
**'''"RscReply"''' - Reply menu (0)
***'''"#User:BIS_Menu_GroupCommunication"''' - Communication menu (0-8)
***'''"#CUSTOM_RADIO"''' - Custom sounds menu (0-9)
**'''"RscRadio"''' - Radio menu (0-0)
*'''"RscGroupRootMenu"''' - "simplified" menu

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
